name: Happy Horrors
description:
Want to share your interest and spend time with someone who isn't a very experienced player? 

Then this is the game for you! Now you can glide, swim and puzzle your way through a range of different levels - without feeling the need to murder each other!

Playable with both controllers and keyboard! A tear in their home book has appeared! What lies on the other side?! Bookjump through the levels!

Developers:

Rebecka Jansson (@mercworm) - Game Design, Programming

Jamison Bolling (@slemhosta) - Game Design, Art, Animation

Damien Steger (@damien-steger) - Game Design, Programming, Sound

Ben Walker (@walkies) - Programming

Leif Eriksson (@leiferiksson) - Art, Animation

Steve Summers (@stonewaxproductions) - Music Composer, Music Producer, Mixing and Mastering Engineer

Special Thanks to:

Steve Halliwell (@stevehalliwell)
